title: What were the books revealed to Allah's Prophets & Messengers? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: [Music] where which means the books of ibrahim and musa can you explain what is the book that this particular ayah or verse is referring to we know brother mahfud that part of the six pillars of iman to believe in the books and the books are allah's revelation to his prophets and messengers we know of the quran we know of the torah given to musa and this is also part of what is referring to it and we know that the injeel was given to isa we know of zaboor given to dawood and we know about such ibrahim what was in it this is something that we do not know because we don't have the original manuscript but we believe in it in totality
